hadiths.text: This hadith has been narrated on the authority of Abu Huraira and Zaid b. Khalid al-Jubani, but in this no merition is made of the words of Ibn Shihab that dafir means rope

chapter.ara-name: باب رَجْمِ الْيَهُودِ أَهْلِ الذِّمَّةِ فِي الزِّنَا
chapter.eng-name: Stoning Jews and Ahl Adh-Dhimmah for Zina
